name: EX
description:
wowza! your girlfriend has left you! time to go after her.

this game uses a ton of plugins that i don't remember from who. i am making this free forever since idk if i'm allowed to use this for commercial use. 

get the soundtrack on bandcamp:

https://bunnydude.bandcamp.com/album/ex-ost

also on spotify:
